评论概述: Nice Sweater design on sleeves Boutique look
评论详情: So yes the Boutique look is in. This sweater will give you that look.  It is comfortable but not full fledge luxury.  The fabric is more acrylic so it is made with cheaper materials, that being said, the style and trendiness factor give it high marks.  The sweater is a bit oversized so a size small will fit a 135lbs woman.  For the price, you get a boutique looking sweater, that will keep you warm.  It looks great with a pair of jeans.
